text: The Biblical Mount Sinai is a mountain that was written about in the Old Testament. It was written by Moses that the Ten Commandments were given to him by God on Mount Sinai. The name Horeb is sometimes used to describe Mount Sinai. Tradition places it at Jebel Musa (Mount Moses) in the south of the Sinai Peninsula, but some see it as being further north at the Wadi Sudr. IVP New Bible Commentary p106 ==Related pages== *Exodus *Deuteronomy == References == == Other websites == *Where is Mount Sinai *The Lost Mountain, 1956-12-03, TIME Category:Old Testament Category:Mountains of Asia
title: Biblical Mount Sinai
